headline: How to stay safe from phishing
keywords: Security Week, Phishing, Security, Cloudflare Area 1
description: Phishing attacks come in all sorts of ways to fool people. Email is definitely the most common, but there are others. Following up on our "Top 50 Most Impersonated Brands in Phishing Attacks" post, here are some tips to help you catch these scams before you fall for them.
